title: One destination, two holidays: Sri Lanka
text:
What lies beneath: a Buddha watches over a Sri Lankan temple (Getty) Do it chic £1,950
With a combination of beaches, cultural heritage, wildlife and cuisine, Sri Lanka could be the world’s most perfect tropical destination. Combine all the above with Abercrombie & Kent, which has a luxury private eight-night trip that includes two days in the Cultural Triangle, a safari in Minneriya National Park, two nights at the elegant Theva Residency, in Kandy, and three nights at the Saman Villas, on the beach at Bentota. Prices start at £1,950pp, including flights, accommodation and guides (01242 547755, abercrombiekent.co.uk ).
Do it cheap £799
The joy of Sri Lanka is that you can live well on a lemonade budget. On this six-night tour from Citrus, you’ll be following much the same route as the chic crowd, on a private guided tour that takes you from the Sigiriya Lion Rock via the Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage and the Hotel Topaz, in Kandy, to the Pandanus
